content:
In Dungeons and Dragons 5th edition, there are several playable races you can choose from. Here are some of the most common races in the game:

1. Human
2. Dwarf
3. Elf
4. Half-Elf
5. Halfling
6. Dragonborn
7. Gnome
8. Half-Orc
9. Tiefling

Each race has its own unique traits and abilities, so choose the one that fits the character you want to play.
